curl.desc: curl is a command-line utility for transferring data to or from a server --> [URL]

MHDDoS.desc: Multi-method, powerful DDoS tool (UDP, TCP, HTTP, and more) --> TCP [TARGET_IP_OR_DOMAIN] [PORT] [THREADS] [TIME_SECONDS] --> example python3 start.py TCP 192.168.1.10 80 1000 60

bonesi.desc: Simulates a DDoS botnet generating UDP, TCP, ICMP floods --> [Target IP:PORT]

wrk.desc: wrk is a modern, high-performance HTTP benchmarking tool that uses multiple threads [-t], connections [-c], and duration [-d] to stress test web servers.
